content: row arms come next right below the neck line sew the mouth on so that the top of the mouth is two row from the white on the head and about 1 row from his neck page 9 of 12 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com next i put on the ears remember they should go low like a real monkey s ears place the butt patch so you are sewing the bottom row over the center of the body your starting circle and the top of it is at row 6 the sew the tail in the center just above the butt patch page 10 of 12 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com the finished monkey the santa hat with beard attached page 11 of 12 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com here is the monkey wearing the santa hat and beard happy holidays page 12 of 12 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com
